p:
For the ABTS‐RS activity, ABTS solution and K 2S 2O 8 were initially mixed together to generate ABTS radical cation solution. After that, the CEO (0.1 ml) or control (0.1 ml) was mixed with the ABTS radical solution (3.9 ml) and its absorbance was recorded at 734 nm. The ABTS‐RS activity was then measured as follows:
ABTS ‐ RS activity
( % )

A control
